name: Switch
0:
”Alexa, open tech assistant”
”Alexa, ask tech assistant to turn on switch one in the guest.”
”Alexa, ask tech assistant to turn off switch three in the kitchen.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech assistant
des:
Tech Assistant is your comprehensive solution for seamless control over your smart devices. With easy voice commands, manage switches across multiple rooms in your home. Whether you’re in the living room, kitchen, guest room, or hall, you can effortlessly turn switches on and off just by asking. This skill supports various smart home devices and is designed to work smoothly with Alexa to make your home automation experience easy and efficient.

Core Features:
Switch Control: Control individual switches across rooms with simple commands like turning on or off switches in specific areas.
User-Friendly Commands: Just say commands like, "Alexa, ask Tech Assistant to turn on switch one in the guest room," for quick, hands-free control.

How to Get Started:
Make sure your Alexa device and smart switches are set up and connected to your home network.
Invoke the skill by saying:
“Alexa, open Tech Assistant.”
“Alexa, ask Tech Assistant to turn on switch one in the kitchen.”
“Alexa, ask Tech Assistant to turn off switch three in the hall.”

Follow the prompts to issue specific commands for each switch and room.

Compatibility:
Supported Devices: Tech Assistant works with Alexa-enabled devices and compatible smart switches connected to the same network.
Account Requirements: Advanced features may require you to link your smart home account with Alexa for a smoother experience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
